_sText:
-------
CREDITS
-------
Put the .bsp file in your counter-strike map folder.

*IMPORTAND* Before you start complaining about my map, YES i took the
drop container from the map zm_4way_tunnel all credits for the drop 
container go to neko_daisuki.

------------------------
Map: zm_toxic_factory_v1
by: whisky
------------------------

Info:

The players are in a factory specialised in breaking down biohazard
materials, the workers all died after attacks from zombies,
your goal to stay alive as long as possible.

The map has alot to offer, such as 2 bunkers with 4 chambers in both, 
an outside area to run away from the zombies,inside the factory with 
some hiding places, and a cellar with toxic waste.
any way you should try it out :) it has some fun secrets to discover!


------------------------------------
Import people who helped me testing:
